medical_history.chief_complaint: LUQ abdominal pain radiating to the back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain present for about a week, worsening markedly in the past day. Patient also reports nausea, distention, decreased urine output for a few days, usual constipation, and no diarrhea. Pain does not worsen with food.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Metastatic small cell lung CA, GERD s/p Nissen fundoplication, Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia, Depression s/p ORIF R leg.
medical_history.family_history: Father with gastric ulcer, uncle with COPD, no family history of lung CA.
